name: Days of Survival
description:
v1.0

Instructions are in-game.

You are stranded on an island, trying to survive for as long as you can! Chop down trees to get wood, mine stone and ores, and craft different tools! Once you get to night, the challenge will really begin. Fight enemies such as zombies, slimes, demons, and more. Every 10 nights, you will get challenged by the Demon King, so prepare yourself by making gold tools and tons of healing potions!

This game is originally a Scratch project, I'm sure you can tell if you are familiar with Scratch. If for whatever reason, you would prefer playing on Scratch, here is the link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/709329493/
